title: Incremental Questioning
description: Demonstrates how IBDM asks questions one at a time (Rule 4.2)
business_narrative: This scenario demonstrates systematic information gathering through incremental questioning. The system asks one question at a time, avoiding user overwhelm while maintaining clear progress toward the goal. This shows the core value of IBDM: transparent, efficient dialogue management.
